    About Me

    I am a senior student in University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC). I have joined GISPAlab since July 2016, advised by Prof. Ping Zhang and then moved to Engineering Laboratory of Optoelectrionics System with my supervisor from Mar 2017, participating in projects about saliency detection and deep learning.

    I also organized Reading Group with the help of Mr. Hongyi Fan (now in Brown Uni.) in my lab.

    Interests

    • Computer Vision
    • Image and Video Processing
    • Machine Learning and Deep learning
    • Probabilistic Graphical Model

    News

    • May. 2018: I will be entering the CSE department in University at Buffalo, SUNY as a PhD student in Fall 2018.
    • July. 2018: I will graduate in Fall, 2018, with a Bachelor degree of Engineering in Electronic and Computer Engineering, UESTC.
    • Sept. 2017: I finished my 3rd year study with GPA 4.0/4.0, ranked 9/192.
